name: Spirit Gorgons. Dance of Myths
description: Spirit Gorgona: Dance of Myths is a digital performance where myth and movement merge in visual harmony. Each video is a solo dance that explores ancient archetypes through contemporary choreography, cloak symbolism, and play with elements of air and light. This NFT is part of a series of images, each of which immerses the viewer in a personal and mythical initiation, creating a unique experience of meeting the spirit of movement.
